RTCTransformEvent.summary: The RTCTransformEvent of the WebRTC API represent an event that is fired in a dedicated worker when an encoded frame has been queued for processing by a WebRTC Encoded Transform.

remarks.para:
The interface has a property that exposes a readable stream and a writable stream.
A worker should read encoded frames from transformer.readable, modify them as needed, and write them to transformer.writable in the same order and without any duplication.
At time of writing there is just one event based on RTCTransformEvent: .
